overview: Alina, Evelyn and Emma host a live cooking show competition for their online followers where they try to distract each other so they can't finish cooking their meals. Adria Rae is a social media superstar that gets to travel the world for free as long as she makes posts online. When housekeeping arrives she comes up with a plan to sneak out, but will Georgia give up her uniform? Eliza's an influencer that loves hiking and being outdoors and posting about it. Her best friend Mackenzie films all of her adventures, but on this hike things take a different turn. When Emily gets home from school everyday she goes right up to her room to masturbate. She's been hearing a weird noise whenever she starts lately and today she catches Kali spying on her with a drone. Emily invites her inside, then explains that since she wasn't able to cum, maybe Kali should help so she can finish.
tagline: These Social Media Sluts Will Do Anything to Get More Followers!
title: Girls with Cameras
